title: Business Lead Capture
description: A short form embedded on a landing page to gather basic info from potential business clients. Ideal for marketing campaigns or product demos.

intro.title: Welcome to Our Business Solution
intro.description: Fill out this short form to learn how our product can help your business grow. Our team will reach out with more information tailored to your needs.

company_name.title: Company Name
company_name.description: Legal or brand name of the organization.

website.title: Website URL
website.description: Optional: We may visit for a quick background check.

industry.title: Industry
industry.description: Select the industry that best describes your business.

email.title: Work Email
email.description: We'll send more info or schedule a product demo.

phone_number.title: Phone Number (Optional)
phone_number.description: If you'd prefer a call or SMS.

submit_message.title: Thank You!
submit_message.description: We've received your information and a member of our team will reach out within 24 hours.
